entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
